prompt: For pages such as Contact, Faculty, Resources, etc., use dummy data. Dummy data can include placeholder text, images, or content.
refinedPrompt: Create a university department website with multiple pages, including Contact, Faculty, and Resources. For these pages, utilize dummy data such as placeholder text, stock images, and generic content to simulate the structure and layout without using actual information. Ensure the design remains professional and visually appealing while clearly indicating the dummy nature of the content.
